name: Black tea
facts: Brewed color: from light golden to rich brown

name: Puer
facts: How much caffeine: 15-60 mg per 220 ml cup

name: White tea
facts: What is it: a type of tea that undergoes weak fermentation (oxidation)

name: Da hong pao
facts: The autumn Da Hong Pao varieties are considered the most fragrant and rich in taste.

name: Earl Grey
facts: Prevalence: one of the most common varieties of flavored tea
